subject: Question regarding shipping goods to Poland
description_text:
Hello,

I want to ask you about the shipping to Poland. On the checkout page I can
see that it is unavailable to select the Poland region:
[image: image.png]
Few questions below
- Is it permanent or is there a way for you to ship these exact pedals to
Poland?
- Would the pedals be shipped to Poland from the EU warehouse?
- If so then no additional Tax would be required for me to pay locally am I
right?

-- 
*Pozdrawiam\Best Regards,*

*Tomasz Trunkwalter*
